Articles.Content:
Well, I feel like this is my best looking replica so far (though I haven't made many), I hope you guys enjoy it as well!

The only mod i used was [*Tweakscale*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112693) to upscale the rear landing gear and tail planes

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/2hul7fjn8ozxm27/Su-27%20Flanker.craft?dl=0)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/LBqFv)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-10T19:03:34Z" title="08/10/2015 07:03  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 10, 2015</time> by Yaeah**

that looks cool, all i have is this mig-23("work in progress") 

![BetngiS.png](http://i.imgur.com/BetngiS.png)

> 
> that looks cool, all i have is this mig-23("work in progress") 
> [http://i.imgur.com/BetngiS.png](http://i.imgur.com/BetngiS.png)

That's pretty awesome, I was meaning to make one, but it seems you've taken the cake

So, it looks like the "Pugachev's Cobra" maneuver is possible, but is actually easier the faster you go, so i'd try it anywhere from 200m/s and above.

Edit: 350 m/s seems to be the sweet spot (at higher altitude)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T17:32:01Z" title="08/09/2015 05:32  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by Yaeah**
what version of KSP does this use and what version of Tweakscale? because it doesnt work for me

> 
> what version of KSP does this use and what version of Tweakscale? because it doesnt work for me

Sorry, didnt catch that I wasnt on the latest version, It has been fixed and the download updated!
A stock version has been posted, but this will stay up for those who want *just that much* more prettiness
